attributes.action: Re-home ex servicemen that are on the streets in the cold and barely getting by.
attributes.additional_details: You walk through towns and cities to see ex-servicemen sitting or laying near buildings and when you talk to them and give them something to eat or drink they tell you about their stories or stuff they have done in service, it's very sad to see our servicemen on the streets without any help from the government, we need to put their foot down and re-home ex-servicemen that deserve a home for serving our country and giving us the security to make us all safe 24/7. please sign this.
attributes.background: Re-home ex servicemen that are on the streets in the cold and barely getting by; they've served our country and the government should give something back to them and re-home them. We give homes to refuges that live off our benefits and there are ex servicemen living on the streets, please sign this.
